name: Best Balanced Performance
description: Balanced configuration for both frequency and magnitude prediction
tuning_notes:
This balanced configuration combines the best of both worlds:
- frequency_scale_init: 20.0 (between best frequency and best magnitude)
- frequency_bias_init: 3.0 (optimal for both)
- weight_decay: 7.5e-5 (balanced regularization)
- magnitude_weight: 1.75, frequency_weight: 1.25 (balanced loss)
- scaling_lr_multiplier: 22, scaling_wd_multiplier: 4 (balanced scaling)

Expected to provide good performance for both frequency and magnitude prediction.
